publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2267 John Swinney: Approval of SSI—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of Specified Authorities) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*

S3M-2267 John Swinney: Approval of SSI—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of Specified Authorities) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford
